title: Time Duration
description:
The [ISO-8601-formatted](https://www.iso.org/standard/40874.html) length of time in years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
Note: The format is PyYmMdDThHmMsS. When an amount is zero, you can omit it. Because week cannot co-exist with other time components in ISO-8601 duration, specify P7D. Make provisions to incorporate the effects of daylight savings time.

For more information, see [durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations).
